item.description:
For the person that just wants to have fun while getting in shape, this class is perfect. A different routine will be taught each week. Music will vary anywhere from Janet Jackson to Missy Elliot. This class will build and strengthen lean muscle, increase flexibility, and shed calories. Each class will start with an intense stretching warm up that incorporates some pilates. At the end of the class we will work towards developing a "six pack" with an abdominal work out. But, in between it's just dance, dance, dance.......So take some "me" time and sign up.

Bring water and wear comfortable clothing (you will be dancing and it should get hot!) and sneakers

Classes are $10 each or get a ten pack for $90 (can be mixed and matched with Secret Physique, Zumba, and Bootcamp classes)

**Please register here http://bridgetsdancestudio.com/registerforadultclass.html

(pre-registration is just for the instructor, no payment is taken until you attend class)
item.why: This class is a fun way to dance off some calories!

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Hip Hop
